name: part_003
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2025】PuPPet~ポルカのおもちゃ箱~【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [a4T91LLjjJw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Start Line!' by Hololive members.
Performance of the song 'fashion check!' by Hololive members.
Performance of the song 'Chuchu Ballerina' by Hololive members.

subtitles.original: ...なをでいよう
subtitles.english: ...stay true.

subtitles.original: スタートライン！
subtitles.english: Start line!

subtitles.original: もし君が 立ち止まり 迷う日は
subtitles.english: If you ever stop and feel lost,

subtitles.original: 瞳とじて ココロの声を聞いて
subtitles.english: Close your eyes and listen to your heart's voice.

subtitles.original: 「諦めない」 その言葉が 道になる
subtitles.english: “I won't give up,” those words will become your path.

subtitles.original: あの日の見た 景色目指して 進もう
subtitles.english: Let's head toward the scenery we saw that day.

subtitles.original: 誰かの真似なんて 退屈なだけさ
subtitles.english: Imitating someone else is just plain boring.

subtitles.original: ひとりひとり 違うから奇跡
subtitles.english: Because we're all different, it's a miracle.

subtitles.original: 一緒に飛ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's fly together.

subtitles.original: 夢は見るものじゃない 叶えるものだよ
subtitles.english: Dreams aren't just for dreaming, they're for making them come true.

subtitles.original: 輝きたい衝動に 素直でいよう
subtitles.english: Let's be true to the impulse to shine.

subtitles.original: 後悔なんて絶対 君には似合わない
subtitles.english: Regret absolutely doesn't suit you.

subtitles.original: 限りない情熱で 飛び越えていこう
subtitles.english: Let's leap over with boundless passion.

subtitles.original: スタートライン！
subtitles.english: Start line!

subtitles.original: さあ 顔あげて
subtitles.english: Come on, look up.

subtitles.original: チャンスが待ってる！
subtitles.english: A chance is waiting!

subtitles.original: 微笑むペプラム
subtitles.english: Smiling peplum

subtitles.original: うっとり水玉
subtitles.english: Enchanting polka dots

subtitles.original: 見方を変えたらキュービック
subtitles.english: If you change your perspective, it's cubic

subtitles.original: 新しい自分と 馴染みのアタシと
subtitles.english: The new me and the familiar me

subtitles.original: おしゃれのパレードは 行く
subtitles.english: The fashion parade goes on

subtitles.original: fashion check go!
subtitles.english: fashion check go!

subtitles.original: 今日は姫カジかな？ (かな)
subtitles.english: Is it hime-kaji today? (Maybe)

subtitles.original: カラーポップもいいな (いいな)
subtitles.english: Color pop is also nice (Nice)

subtitles.original: 指に触れるカラフル イェイイェイ
subtitles.english: Colorful touches on my fingers, yay yay

subtitles.original: キュンとワクワクさせるんだ
subtitles.english: It makes my heart throb and flutter

subtitles.original: ピンクは夢見る自分に
subtitles.english: Pink is for the dreaming me

subtitles.original: ミドリはまっすぐな自分に
subtitles.english: Green is for the straightforward me

subtitles.original: 無限の遊び場にて
subtitles.english: In the infinite playground

subtitles.original: 万華鏡みたいに変われる
subtitles.english: I can change like a kaleidoscope

subtitles.original: (red, pink, blue, yellow!)
subtitles.english: (red, pink, blue, yellow!)

subtitles.original: 例えばcuteに
subtitles.english: For example, cute

subtitles.original: 例えばsweetに
subtitles.english: For example, sweet

subtitles.original: いつもと違う日曜日
subtitles.english: A Sunday different from the usual

subtitles.original: 夢から覚めても おとぎの国へと
subtitles.english: Even if I wake up from a dream, to a fairy tale land

subtitles.original: おしゃれの旅は続く 続く
subtitles.english: The fashion journey continues and continues

subtitles.original: (fashion check ful!)
subtitles.english: (fashion check ful!)

subtitles.original: つま先で立って 星に手を のばした1日
subtitles.english: Standing on tiptoe, a day spent reaching for the stars

subtitles.original: 翼の毛布にくるまれて さぁ脚を休めて
subtitles.english: Wrapped in a blanket of wings, now rest your legs

subtitles.original: 疲れているのなんて感じない しあわせで
subtitles.english: I don't even feel tired because I'm so happy

subtitles.original: 瞳は花のように 閉じずに咲いている
subtitles.english: My eyes are like flowers, blooming without closing

subtitles.original: 眠らなきゃ それなのに なんか夢ばかり冴えて
subtitles.english: I should sleep, and yet, dreams are just so vivid

subtitles.original: そうね胸がおどるの
subtitles.english: Yes, my heart is dancing

subtitles.original: 明日への幕があく
subtitles.english: The curtain rises for tomorrow
